metadata.title: CVE-2019-10747 on Ubuntu 18.04 LTS (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: set-value is vulnerable to Prototype Pollution in versions lower than3.0.1. The function mixin-deep could be tricked into adding or modifyingproperties of Object.prototype using any of the constructor, prototype and_proto_ payloads.

criterions.comment: node-set-value package in bionic is affected and may need fixing.
